Title: Day 5: 2:00 A.M. - 3:00 A.M.
Plot:
After stowing away aboard the flight containing Henderson's contact and the incriminating recording, Jack finds himself having to deal with a pilot who refuses to cooperate.

Martha begins to break down, and Mike becomes suspicious of what she is hiding from him, while Logan tries to calm his financial backers.
GuestStars: Aleksandra Kaniak,  Lissa Pallo,  Keith Pillow,  Perry Kelly,  Aaron MacPherson,  Philip Lester,  Tracy Howe,  David Batiste,  Stephanie Erb,  Blake Robbins,  Andrew Hawkes,  Kirk B.R. Woller,  Richard Gilliland
